lexUnit.name: lining.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a layer of different material covering or attached to the inside of something

sentence.text: EUROTUNNEL , the Channel tunnel group , denied last night that the concrete linings of the Channel Tunnel could be contaminated by salt and fail prematurely .
There was the loose lining of my denim cap to stitch , and a button to sew on my trousers .

The saturated fat in a diet , more importantly , stimulates the liver to produce more cholesterol in a form that is easily deposited onto the linings of the arteries .
This allows the lining of the uterus to be cleared out properly , and thus provide a good implantation site for the new fetus to settle on .
